data.description: This is a simple E-commerce Website Platform which is created by me and I have used HTML, CSS and JavaScript for UI as well as JavaScript is used for backend and I have used simple localstorage for storing the data.
This is a UI project in which I have used Flutter for Android and iOS. It contains login screen, signup screen, Reels screen, messages, feed home screen with story section.
Created a fully dynamic weather app with realtime data showing for particular location using OpenWeather API and Flutter.
Simple shopping app using Flutter with Add to Cart, product page, home page, and search feature.
Created API for Elearning platform using Laravel. Features include everything required for an E-Learning platform like Udemy.
Simple Google UI Clone for Homepage using HTML and CSS. More projects are available on my GitHub.
Simple responsive calculator using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. All operations can be performed easily.
EdTech mobile app with 15K+ users. Developed using Flutter for Android and iOS, integrating REST APIs and Firebase services for real-time updates and smooth performance.
HRMS mobile application for employee management with 1K+ users. Built using Flutter, optimized performance by 40%, integrated REST APIs and Firebase services.
Food ordering mobile app developed in Flutter. Features include order management, payment processing, user authentication, and real-time order tracking with push notifications.
Food-focused social application using Flutter, Node.js, Socket.io, and Firebase. Features include recipe sharing, user feeds, notifications, posts, likes, comments, and restaurant module.
